judges: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE AJAY TEWARI .Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment
judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB & HARYANA AT 
CHANDIGARH
LPA No. 253 of 1994 
Date of Decision: 28.6.2010
Medical Council of India and others 
..Appellants

Versus
Miss. Alka Verma and others 
 ..Respondents

CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE MUKUL MUDGAL, CHIEF JUSTICE
 HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE AJAY TEWARI
.Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment ? 
.Whether to be referred to the Reporters or not ?
.Whether the judgment should be reported in the Digest?
Present :
 None for the parties.
*****
MUKUL MUDGAL, C.J. 

(Oral)

 No one is present on behalf of the appellants. Since the
matter involved in this appeal is similar to the one involved in Civil
Writ Petition No. 2944 of 1994 which has been disposed of today by
passing a detailed order, this appeal is also disposed of in the same
terms. However, it is made clear that in case any issue which needs
adjudication by the Court survives, the appellants may apply for revival
of the appeal. 

 (MUKUL MUDGAL)
 CHIEF JUSTICE
 (AJAY TEWARI)
 JUDGE
.06.2010
'ravinder'
